title: S3 Ep27: The Great Reversal
itunes:title: The Great Reversal
description: Thomas Philippon's new book argues that in the last 20 years the US has “given up” on free markets. As a result, he tells Tim Phillips, American families are each $5,000 a year poorer.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
